Arguments.Name: String1
Arguments.Tooltip: First input string. Must be the same length as the other input string.

Arguments.Name: String2
Arguments.Tooltip: Second input string. Must be the same length as the other input string.

Arguments.Name: HDistance
Arguments.Tooltip:
Hamming Distance output as Int32. A distance of 0 means the strings are identical.
A higher distance indicates more differences between the strings.

Arguments.Name: DissimilarSymbolDictionary
Arguments.Tooltip: Dictionary of dissimilarities. Keys are Int32 and define position that uses one-based indexing (position 1 key is 1, 2 is 2 etc), and Values are the dissimilar symbol as String in that position.
